Legal_Issue: Whether the PRRA Officer failed to consider the totality of the evidence provided by the applicant
Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned credibility due to lack of corroboration
Evidence_Type: Claimed membership in Madhiban clan, risk of persecution
Legal_Provision: Section 115 of IRPA (risk assessment prior to removal)
Basis_of_Claim: Persecution risk as a member of the Madhiban clan in Somalia
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of sufficient corroboration, localized improvements in Somalia's human rights situation
Proceeding_Type: Administrative decision followed by judicial review
Application_Error: Alleged failure to consider all evidence
Evidence_Ignored: Applicant claimed evidence was ignored; court found it was reasonably assessed
Application_Factor: Membership in a persecuted clan, country conditions in Somalia
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient evidence of personal risk despite clan membership
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of documentary or testimonial corroboration
Procedural_Fairness: Assessed as met; decision was transparent and justified
Credibility_Issues: Central issue due to uncorroborated claims
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on alleged failure to consider totality of evidence
Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of administrative decisions
